purpose: This code appears to be part of a package that collects system information and sends it to a Discord webhook. It retrieves internal and external IP addresses, system details, and package metadata.
flows: package -> directory -> home_directory -> username -> dns -> internal_hostname -> trackingData -> webhookURL
anomalies: Use of hardcoded Discord webhook URL
Sending sensitive system information to external service
Collection of internal IP address and hostname
Collection of external IP address via ipinfo.io
Sending package metadata and system info to third-party webhook
analysis: The code collects various system and package information including IP addresses, hostnames, user details, DNS servers, and package metadata. It then sends this data to a hardcoded Discord webhook URL, which is a clear indicator of telemetry or data exfiltration behavior. The code uses both internal and external IP detection methods, suggesting it's designed to gather comprehensive network information about the system.
conclusion: This code exhibits malicious behavior by collecting system information and transmitting it to an external Discord webhook without user consent.
